attributes.action: LAW TO MAKE ALL DOG OWNERS LIABLE FOR THERE DOGS PRIVATE AND PUBLIC AREAS.
attributes.additional_details: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT DOG OWNERS TO BE FULLY RESPONSIBLE FOR THE DOGS ACTIONS, THIS WOULD APPLY TO BOTH IN PUBLIC AND PRIVATE LAND AREAS, OWNERS MUST BE FULLY LIABLE FOR THE DOG WITH THEM SET WITH A LARGE FINE AND FULL DAMAGES TO THIRD PARTIES, MANY DOG OWNERS ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE AT THIS TIME CAUSING HEARTACHE TO MEMBERS OF THE PUBLIC WHO ARE, A NUMBER OF DOGS ARE TRAINED TO ATTACK, WRONG AS THEY ARE PETS AND WILL ATTACK ANYBODY ONCE TRAINED IN A POOR FASHION.
